items.verified_desc: Every listing is checked to keep your journey transparent and safe.
items.search_desc: Find the right match instantly with smart filters and clean UI.
items.pricing_desc: Market insights help you choose the best offer without stress.

partners.title: Our partners
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with the best companies in the automobile industry.

hero_new.title: Smart Car Search with AI Assistance
hero_new.subtitle: Get personalized help finding your perfect car with our AI assistant. We gather comprehensive vehicle data from trusted sources like CarVertical, analyze market trends, and provide expert recommendations.

features_new.title: Why Choose Us
features_new.ai_search_desc: Our intelligent assistant learns your preferences and finds the perfect match for you.
features_new.vehicle_history_desc: Access comprehensive data from CarVertical and other trusted sources for every vehicle.
features_new.personal_helper_desc: Get dedicated assistance throughout your car buying journey, from search to purchase.

unique_services.title: Your Complete Car Search
unique_services.subtitle: We don't just list cars. We provide intelligent tools, verified data, and personal support to help you make the best decision.

ai_assistant.title: AI Assistant
ai_assistant.description: Your personal AI-powered car advisor that understands your needs and preferences.

carvertical.title: CarVertical Integration
carvertical.description: Access comprehensive vehicle history reports from multiple trusted sources.

personal_helper.title: Personal Helper
personal_helper.description: Dedicated human support to guide you through every step of your car buying journey.

additional.verified_data_desc: All information cross-checked from multiple reliable sources
additional.market_analytics_desc: Real-time pricing trends and market insights
additional.chat_support_desc: Instant answers to all your questions anytime

unique_services.cta_title: Ready to Experience Smart Car Search?
unique_services.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied users who found their perfect car with our AI-powered platform

personal_assistant.title: Your Personal Car
personal_assistant.subtitle: Not sure what car fits your lifestyle? Our dedicated human experts work with you one-on-one to understand your needs, define your perfect criteria, and find the best match for you.

benefits.benefit_1: Real human expert, not just a chatbot
benefits.benefit_2: Unbiased recommendations based on your needs
benefits.benefit_3: Save hours of research and comparison
benefits.benefit_6: Complete support from search to purchase

expert_card.title: Meet Your Expert
expert_card.quote: I've helped thousands of people find their perfect car. Let me help you make the best decision based on your unique needs and lifestyle.
expert_card.name: Car Advisor Team

steps.title: How It Works:
steps.step_1_desc: Tell us about your lifestyle, budget, and preferences in a casual conversation
steps.step_2_desc: Our expert helps you identify exactly what matters most in your perfect car
steps.step_3_desc: We search, analyze, and shortlist the best options tailored specifically for you
steps.step_4_desc: Get expert guidance through the selection process until you find the perfect car

banner.title: Why Choose a Personal Assistant?
banner.subtitle: While our AI helps you search efficiently, our human experts provide the personal touch, experience, and intuition that technology can't replace. Get the best of both worlds!

trust_benefits.title: Why Choose
trust_benefits.secure_desc: We guarantee transparency and reliability in every purchase.
trust_benefits.fast_desc: Convenient filters and smart search help you find your car in seconds.
trust_benefits.support_desc: Our team is always ready to assist you at every step.
trust_benefits.deals_desc: We offer the best prices and offers from dealers and owners.
